flow.descriptionCdata:
04784eb4-ae86-4e66-9102-2699392be3a6.41329dff-c099-4fae-93c7-7325deeddf1b.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
04784eb4-ae86-4e66-9102-2699392be3a6.5013e517-0df2-4fe9-b479-af4d37326b5e.description=
Iterates through a list of values. Modifying the value of the list and delimiter inputs during iteration is not generally supported.

Inputs\:
list - The list to iterate through.
separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the list.

Returns\:
The current element of the list, if the response is has more

Responses\:
has more - Another value was in the list, and has been returned.
has no more - The iterator has gone fully through the list. This response will only be returned once per iteration through the list, a subsequent call to the Iterator will restart the Iteration through the list.
failure - failed to process the list.

Note\: Where the iterator is in the list is tracked by each step's unique id. Therefore you can iterate on the same list from multiple steps simultaneously.

WARNING\: Any step that will use the results of this Iterator operation will, by default, attempt to assign that step's inputs from a flow variable. If this is left checked, then the first element of the iterator will be used for every cycle of iteration.
04784eb4-ae86-4e66-9102-2699392be3a6.8d321cf7-5764-4274-93a3-e950324394ee.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
04784eb4-ae86-4e66-9102-2699392be3a6.afd30a4e-aa99-435c-be49-9abe3ae634e1.description=
Iterates through a list of values. Modifying the value of the list and delimiter inputs during iteration is not generally supported.

Inputs\:
list - The list to iterate through.
separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the list.

Returns\:
The current element of the list, if the response is has more

Responses\:
has more - Another value was in the list, and has been returned.
has no more - The iterator has gone fully through the list. This response will only be returned once per iteration through the list, a subsequent call to the Iterator will restart the Iteration through the list.
failure - failed to process the list.

Note\: Where the iterator is in the list is tracked by each step's unique id. Therefore you can iterate on the same list from multiple steps simultaneously.

WARNING\: Any step that will use the results of this Iterator operation will, by default, attempt to assign that step's inputs from a flow variable. If this is left checked, then the first element of the iterator will be used for every cycle of iteration.
04784eb4-ae86-4e66-9102-2699392be3a6.description=
This workflow adds public actions on the server groups and server components. It adds Add Server and Add Disk actions at the server group level and Power on/off server at the server component level.

Inputs\:
srvGrpList		- CSA Component Id of one or more server group to which the public actions ( Add Server and Add Disk ) are to be attached delimited by pipe | operator
		  Eg \: ||....
srvList		- CSA Component Id of one or more server to which the public actions ( Power on Server and Power off Server ) are to be attached delimited by pipe | operator
		  Eg \: ||....
userIdentifier	- CSA User Identifier 
RSC_PROVIDER_ID	- CSA Resource Provider Id for the MOE provider

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
flow.name: Add MOE Public Actions

staticBinding.value: <action> <isCriticalSystemObject>false</isCriticalSystemObject> <description>Adds Additinal data disk to all the servers in the ServerGroup</description> <name>Add Disk</name> <displayName>Add Disk</displayName> <errorOnTimeout>false</errorOnTimeout> <failOnError>false</failOnError> <processDefinition> <name>/Library/CSA/3.0/Providers/Matrix Operating Environment/HP IO Lifecycle/Actions/MOE Add Disk</name> </processDefinition> <stateConstraint> <lifecycleState> <name>DEPLOYED</name> </lifecycleState> <lifecycleSubstate> <name>TRANSITION</name> </lifecycleSubstate> <lifecycleExecOrder>0</lifecycleExecOrder> </stateConstraint> <synchronous>false</synchronous> <timeout>0</timeout> <consumerVisible>true</consumerVisible> <property> <name>RSC_PROVIDER_ID</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>${RSC_PROVIDER_ID}</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> <property> <name>SVC_INSTANCE_ID</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>[TOKEN:SVC_INSTANCE_ID]</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> <property> <name>SVC_COMPONENT_ID</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>[TOKEN:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> <property> <name>PRN_COMPONENT_ID</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>[TOKEN:PRN_COMPONENT_ID]</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> <property> <name>REQ_USER_ID</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>[TOKEN:REQ_USER_ID]</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> <property> <name>SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE</name> <valueType> <name>STRING</name> </valueType> <values> <value>[TOKEN:SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]</value> </values> <consumerVisible>false</consumerVisible> </property> </action>
